DOC.brief_title: The Study Cardiovascular Outcomes Women With Preeclampsia Using Echocardiography : The SCOPE Study
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective cohort study . Exposed case admit inpatient obstetrical unit ( labor & delivery antepartum unit ) Hospital University Pennsylvania concern severe preterm preeclampsia . Unexposed control match gestational age clinical factor obtain outpatient setting ( Helen O Dickens clinic Penn ObGyn Associates 3701 Market Street ) . The investigator compare cardiovascular risk factor two group .
DOC.criteria: Exposed case : African American woman admit obstetrical unit concern severe preeclampsia . Patients must preterm ( 2336 6/7 week ) live singleton gestation least 18 year old . Women baseline chronic hypertension woman magnesium include . NonAfrican American woman , African woman concern severe preeclampsia admit 23 week 37 week . Women labor exclude . Women preexist cardiovascular disease woman current smoker exclude . Unexposed control : African American woman obtain prenatal care outpatient set meet matching criterion note .
